The **geocomp*x*** project is a community-driven effort to provide resources for learning and teaching about geocomputation in multiple programming languages.
It is about *eXchanging information* about geocomputation, *cross (X) pollination of ideas* from one programming language for working with geographic data to another, and hosting additional content on *geocomputation with (X) other languages*.
